description: Recommended Claude Code settings for workflow plugin. Copy to your project's .claude/settings.json or .claude/settings.local.json

notes.usage: Copy this to your project's .claude/settings.json (shared) or .claude/settings.local.json (personal)
notes.how-it-works: Rules evaluate: deny > ask > allow. Bash(*) allows all commands except those in deny/ask lists.
notes.allow: Bash(*) permits all bash commands. mcp__<server-name> permits all tools from that MCP server. Add your own MCP servers here (e.g., mcp__slack, mcp__playwright).
notes.ask: These commands prompt for user confirmation before executing
notes.deny: These commands are always blocked regardless of other rules
notes.env: Environment variables that enhance workflow capabilities. Agent Teams enables peer-to-peer agent messaging for swarm mode (experimental).
